query.statement:
-- 2020.08.26 Æ©´× SELECT T1.CS131_BSU CS131_ARA ,T1.NAME1 ARA_NM ,T1.CS131_ABG ,T1.CTEXT2 ABG_NM ,VALUE(T2.CS131_DESU,0) CS131_DESU ,VALUE(T2.CS131_DANGA,0) CS131_DANGA ,VALUE(T2.CS131_MECHUL,0) CS131_MECHUL ,VALUE(T2.CS136_DESU,0) CS136_DESU ,VALUE(T2.CS136_DANGA,0) CS136_DANGA ,VALUE(T2.CS136_GISUNBI,0) CS136_GISUNBI ,VALUE(T2.MECHULDEGISUNG,0) MECHULDEGISUNG FROM (SELECT 'V' GBN ,A.LGORT CS131_BSU ,A.NAME1 ,B.CODE2 CS131_ABG ,B.CTEXT2 FROM (SELECT MM005.LGORT ,MM012.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZWBT010 WB010 ,SAPHEE.ZMMT012 MM012 ,SAPHEE.ZMMT005 MM005 WHERE WB010.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND WB010.BSU_ARA = #AREA# AND WB010.MANDT = MM012.MANDT AND WB010.LIFNR = MM012.LIFNR AND MM012.MANDT = MM005.MANDT AND MM012.LIFNR = MM005.LIFNR AND WB010.BSU_GB = '3' ) A, (SELECT 'W' CODE2 ,'¼Ò°è' CTEXT2 FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 UNION ALL SELECT CODE2 ,CTEXT2 FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND LANG = #G_LANG# AND CODE1 = 'CS112' ) B
UNION ALL SELECT 'Z' GBN, 'ZZZZ' CS131_BSU, 'ÀüÃ¼ °è' NAME1,'Z' CS131_ABG,'' CTEXT2 FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 UNION ALL SELECT 'Y' GBN, 'YYYY' CS131_BSU, 'Çù·Â»ç °è' NAME1,'Y' CS131_ABG,'' CTEXT2 FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) T1 LEFT OUTER JOIN ( --º¸¼ö¾÷Ã¼,ºôµù±¸ºÐº° °è SELECT A.CS131_BSU ,A.CS131_ABG ,VALUE(A.CS131_DESU,0) CS131_DESU ,CASE WHEN A.CS131_DESU > 0 THEN CEIL(DOUBLE(A.CS131_MECHUL)/DOUBLE(A.CS131_DESU)) ELSE 0 END CS131_DANGA ,VALUE(A.CS131_MECHUL,0) CS131_MECHUL ,A.CS136_DESU ,CASE WHEN A.CS136_DESU > 0 THEN CEIL(DOUBLE(A.CS136_GISUNBI)/DOUBLE(A.CS136_DESU)) ELSE 0 END CS136_DANGA ,A.CS136_GISUNBI ,CASE WHEN A.CS136_DESU * A.CS131_MECHUL > 0 THEN ROUND((DOUBLE(A.CS136_GISUNBI)*DOUBLE(A.CS131_DESU))/(DOUBLE(A.CS131_MECHUL)*DOUBLE(A.CS136_DESU)),2)*100 ELSE 0 END MECHULDEGISUNG FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN CS136A.CS136_BSU = '' OR CS136A.CS136_BSU IS NULL THEN 'ZZZZ' ELSE CS136A.CS136_BSU END CS131_BSU ,CASE WHEN (CS136A.CS136_ABG = '' OR CS136A.CS136_ABG IS NULL) AND (CS136A.CS136_BSU = '' OR CS136A.CS136_BSU IS NULL) THEN 'Z' WHEN (CS136A.CS136_ABG = '' OR CS136A.CS136_ABG IS NULL) AND (CS136A.CS136_BSU IS NOT NULL) THEN 'W' ELSE CS136A.CS136_ABG END CS131_ABG ,SUM(CS131A.CS131_DESU) CS131_DESU ,SUM(CS131A.CS131_MECHUL) CS131_MECHUL ,SUM(CS136A.CS136_DESU) CS136_DESU ,SUM(CS136A.CS136_GISUNBI) CS136_GISUNBI FROM (SELECT CS131B.MANDT ,CS131B.CS131_ARA ,CS131B.CS131_BSU ,CS131B.CS131_ABG ,COUNT(*) CS131_DESU ,SUM(DOUBLE(VALUE(CS131B.CS131_AMT,0))) CS131_MECHUL FROM SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131B WHERE CS131B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS131B.CS131_ARA = #AREA# AND CS131B.CS131_MYM BETWEEN #YYYYMMF# AND #YYYYMMT# AND CS131B.VBELN > '' AND CS131B.CS131_MYB = '' AND CS131B.CS131_GND IN ('A','B','C','D','E') GROUP BY CS131B.MANDT,CS131B.CS131_ARA,CS131B.CS131_BSU,CS131B.CS131_ABG ) CS131A RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CS136B.MANDT ,CS136B.CS136_ARA ,CS136B.CS136_BSU ,CS136B.CS136_ABG ,CASE MAX(CS136B.CS136_GBU) WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(*) END CS136_DESU ,0 CS136_DANGA ,SUM(DOUBLE(CASE CS136B.CS136_GBU WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE VALUE(CS136B.CS136_BAM,0) END) +DOUBLE(CASE CS136B.CS136_GBU WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE VALUE(CS136B.CS136_IY1,0) END) +DOUBLE(CASE CS136B.CS136_GBU WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE VALUE(CS136B.CS136_IY2,0) END) +DOUBLE(CASE CS136B.CS136_GBU WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE VALUE(CS136B.CS136_IY3,0) END) +DOUBLE(CASE CS136B.CS136_GBU WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE VALUE(CS136B.CS136_IY4,0) END) +DOUBLE(CASE CS136B.CS136_GBU WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE VALUE(CS136B.CS136_RET,0) END)) CS136_GISUNBI ,0 MECHULDEGISUNG FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136B LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131C ON CS131C.MANDT = CS136B.MANDT AND CS131C.CS131_UPN = CS136B.CS136_UPN AND CS131C.CS131_CST = CS136B.CS136_CST AND CS131C.CS131_PJT = CS136B.CS136_PJT AND CS131C.CS131_HNO = CS136B.CS136_HNO AND CS131C.CS131_SEQ = CS136B.CS136_SEQ AND CS131C.CS131_GND = CS136B.CS136_GND AND CS131C.CS131_MYM = CS136B.CS136_JYM AND CS131C.CS131_ISR = CS136B.CS136_ISR WHERE CS136B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136B.CS136_GYM BETWEEN #YYYYMMF# AND #YYYYMMT# AND CS136B.CS136_PST = 'A6' AND ((CS136B.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136B.CS136_GNO > '' AND CS136B.CS136_BDGBN = '')) AND CS136B.CS136_ARA = #AREA# AND ((CS136B.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136B.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136B.CS136_BDGBN = '')) AND (CS131C.VBELN IS NULL OR CS131C.VBELN > '') AND VALUE(CS131C.CS131_MYB,'') = '' AND ((CS136B.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136B.CS136_GGB = '' AND CS136B.CS136_BDGBN = '')) GROUP BY CS136B.MANDT,CS136B.CS136_ARA,CS136B.CS136_BSU,CS136B.CS136_ABG ) CS136A ON CS136A.MANDT = CS131A.MANDT AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = CS131A.CS131_ARA AND CS136A.CS136_BSU = CS131A.CS131_BSU AND CS136A.CS136_ABG = CS131A.CS131_ABG GROUP BY ROLLUP(CS136A.CS136_BSU,CS136A.CS136_ABG) ) A
UNION ALL
-- Çù·Â»ç°è SELECT A.CS131_BSU ,A.CS131_ABG ,VALUE(A.CS131_DESU,0) CS131_DESU ,CASE WHEN A.CS131_DESU > 0 THEN CEIL(DOUBLE(A.CS131_MECHUL)/DOUBLE(A.CS131_DESU)) ELSE 0 END CS131_DANGA ,VALUE(A.CS131_MECHUL,0) CS131_MECHUL ,A.CS136_DESU ,CASE WHEN A.CS136_DESU > 0 THEN CEIL(DOUBLE(A.CS136_GISUNBI)/DOUBLE(A.CS136_DESU)) ELSE 0 END CS136_DANGA ,A.CS136_GISUNBI ,CASE WHEN A.CS136_DESU * A.CS131_MECHUL > 0 THEN ROUND((DOUBLE(A.CS136_GISUNBI)*DOUBLE(A.CS131_DESU))/(DOUBLE(A.CS131_MECHUL)*DOUBLE(A.CS136_DESU)),2)*100 ELSE 0 END MECHULDEGISUNG FROM (SELECT CS136A.CS136_ARA ,'YYYY' CS131_BSU ,'Y' CS131_ABG ,SUM(CS131A.CS131_DESU) CS131_DESU ,SUM(CS131A.CS131_MECHUL) CS131_MECHUL ,SUM(CS136A.CS136_DESU) CS136_DESU ,SUM(CS136A.CS136_GISUNBI) CS136_GISUNBI FROM (SELECT CS131B.MANDT ,CS131B.CS131_ARA ,CS131B.CS131_BSU ,CS131B.CS131_ABG ,COUNT(*) CS131_DESU ,SUM(DOUBLE(VALUE(CS131B.CS131_AMT,0))) CS131_MECHUL FROM SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131B WHERE CS131B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS131B.CS131_ARA = #AREA# AND CS131B.CS131_MYM BETWEEN #YYYYMMF# AND #YYYYMMT# AND CS131B.VBELN > '' AND CS131B.CS131_MYB = '' AND CS131B.CS131_GBU = '3' AND CS131B.CS131_GND IN ('A','B','C','D','E') AND CS131B.CS131_BDGBN = '' -- ºÐ´ãÀÌÇà¹æ½ÄÀÌ ¾Æ´Ï°Í¸¸ GROUP BY CS131B.MANDT,CS131B.CS131_ARA,CS131B.CS131_BSU,CS131B.CS131_ABG ) CS131A RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CS136B.MANDT ,CS136B.CS136_ARA ,CS136B.CS136_BSU ,CS136B.CS136_ABG ,CASE MAX(CS136B.CS136_GBU) WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE COUNT(*) END CS136_DESU ,0 CS136_DANGA ,SUM(DOUBLE(CASE CS136B.CS136_GBU WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE VALUE(CS136B.CS136_BAM,0) END) +DOUBLE(CASE CS136B.CS136_GBU WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE VALUE(CS136B.CS136_IY1,0) END) +DOUBLE(CASE CS136B.CS136_GBU WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE VALUE(CS136B.CS136_IY2,0) END) +DOUBLE(CASE CS136B.CS136_GBU WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE VALUE(CS136B.CS136_IY3,0) END) +DOUBLE(CASE CS136B.CS136_GBU WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE VALUE(CS136B.CS136_IY4,0) END) +DOUBLE(CASE CS136B.CS136_GBU WHEN '1' THEN 0 ELSE VALUE(CS136B.CS136_RET,0) END)) CS136_GISUNBI ,0 MECHULDEGISUNG FROM SAPHEE.ZCST136 CS136B LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZCST131 CS131C ON CS131C.MANDT = CS136B.MANDT AND CS131C.CS131_UPN = CS136B.CS136_UPN AND CS131C.CS131_CST = CS136B.CS136_CST AND CS131C.CS131_PJT = CS136B.CS136_PJT AND CS131C.CS131_HNO = CS136B.CS136_HNO AND CS131C.CS131_SEQ = CS136B.CS136_SEQ AND CS131C.CS131_GND = CS136B.CS136_GND AND CS131C.CS131_MYM = CS136B.CS136_JYM AND CS131C.CS131_ISR = CS136B.CS136_ISR WHERE CS136B.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND CS136B.CS136_GYM BETWEEN #YYYYMMF# AND #YYYYMMT# AND CS136B.CS136_PST = 'A6' AND CS136B.CS136_GNO > '' AND CS136B.CS136_ARA = #AREA# AND ((CS136B.CS136_MGB = '' AND CS136B.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136B.CS136_BDGBN = '')) AND (CS131C.VBELN IS NULL OR CS131C.VBELN > '') AND VALUE(CS131C.CS131_MYB,'') = '' AND ((CS136B.CS136_GBU = '3' AND CS136B.CS136_GGB = '' AND CS136B.CS136_BDGBN = '')) GROUP BY CS136B.MANDT,CS136B.CS136_ARA,CS136B.CS136_BSU,CS136B.CS136_ABG ) CS136A ON CS136A.MANDT = CS131A.MANDT AND CS136A.CS136_ARA = CS131A.CS131_ARA AND CS136A.CS136_BSU = CS131A.CS131_BSU AND CS136A.CS136_ABG = CS131A.CS131_ABG GROUP BY CS136A.CS136_ARA ) A ) T2 ON T1.CS131_BSU = T2.CS131_BSU AND T1.CS131_ABG = T2.CS131_ABG ORDER BY T1.GBN,T1.CS131_BSU,T1.CS131_ABG
WITH UR
